name: ClickCells: Summer
summary:
LeArtNi has prepared a new batch of pics with sultry girls for you!
But you need to solve a series of puzzles to see them: keep a blue ball on the platform for three seconds and they are yours!

- The art of a beautiful girl performed by the master of his craft LeArtNi!
- Relaxing music from composer Trauerbaum.
- Lots of fun!
info:

  • 游戏类型: 休闲
